flavorText: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

foreignData.flavorText: „Du kannst zurückkommen, sobald du Manieren hast und weißt, wie du deine körperliche Gestalt wiederherstellen kannst."
foreignData.name: Ätherisieren
foreignData.text: Bringe alle angreifenden Kreaturen auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vuelve cuando aprendas modales... y hayas averiguado cómo reconstruir tu estructura física".
foreignData.name: Eterizar
foreignData.text: Regresa todas las criaturas atacantes a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreignData.flavorText: « Revenez quand vous aurez appris les bonnes manières... et trouvé le moyen de reconstituer vos corps. »
foreignData.name: Étherisation
foreignData.text: Renvoyez toutes les créatures attaquantes dans la main de leur propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: "Torna quando avrai imparato le buone maniere… e a ricostituire la tua forma fisica."
foreignData.name: Eterizzare
foreignData.text: Fai tornare tutte le creature attaccanti in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreignData.flavorText: 「少し礼儀というものを学んでから出直すんだな。それに、肉体を再構成する方法も見つけたほうがいい。」
foreignData.name: 霊気化
foreignData.text: 攻撃クリーチャーをすべてオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: "Voltem quando tiverem aprendido boas maneiras... e descoberto como reconstituir suas formas físicas."
foreignData.name: Eterificar
foreignData.text: Devolva todas as criaturas atacantes para as mãos de seus donos.

foreignData.flavorText: «Можете вернуться, когда научитесь себя вести... и когда узнаете, как вернуть себе прежний облик».
foreignData.name: Превращение в Эфир
foreignData.text: Верните все атакующие существа в руки их владельцев.

foreignData.flavorText: 「等你学会礼貌，想出如何重构你的形体后就可以回来。」
foreignData.name: 乙太化
foreignData.text: 将所有进行攻击的生物移回其拥有者手上。

name: Aetherize
originalText: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat. There's no such thing as an attacking creature outside of the combat phase.

text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
